properties.title: Gothenburg City Museum
properties.description: Elegant mid-18th century building housing collections related to 12,000 years of the area's history.

properties.title: Borås Museum
properties.description: A lovely museum in the quiet town of Borås

properties.title: Medelhavsmuseet
properties.description: Ancient Greek & Roman antiquities, plus Egyptian mummies & Islamic artworks in a high-tech museum.

properties.title: Haga
properties.description: Haga is a charming area of traditional wood buildings and cobbled streets, home to 17th-century fortress Skansen Kronan. Candlelit cafes and pubs with terraced courtyards create a bohemian vibe around Järntorget square and adjoining Långgatorna thoroughfares. The area is dotted with vegan bistros and bakeries known for cinnamon buns. Quaint stores sell books, crafts and knitwear.

properties.title: Skansen Kronan
properties.description: Hillside conference & wedding venue in a one-time fortress with panoramic views of the city.

properties.title: Skrapan
properties.description: Shopping mall with specialty stores, coffee shops & a top-floor restaurant with city views.
